document_data.name: Blackraven Lane
document_data.refs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220221195407/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_1112-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Nov â€“ Dec 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Blackraven Lane''' was a street in the rich [[Baldur's Gate/Manorborn|Manorborn]] district of [[Baldur's Gate]] that began at the edge of the [[Temples District]] and moved west crossing almost the entire Manorborn.
document_data.Description: Blackraven Lane began near the [[Chalsendace Street]], from the plaza where the [[Vammas Estate]] stood, passed the home of [[Krammoch Arkhstaff]], crossed with [[Hauth Lane]] and [[Wendserpent Street]] on the [[Three Spires]] moot, continued west past the [[Bormul House]], and ended after reaching the [[Sashenstar Estate]].
